entry.title: Calendar support
entry.content:
Pages in the Upcoming Events and Curriculm sections of the website now carry spiffy calendar links (look for an icon decorated with a drop-shadow effect). Clicking on one of these links will automatically add the relevant schedule information to the electronic diary included in most modern computers and mobile devices. For the convenience of overseas site visitors, calendar dates and times are set in universal time, and will adjust to the visitor's own timezone.

We hope that this new facility will make participating in the life of the faculty that much easier for staff, students, and both virtual and on-campus visitors.
